phrs.translation: 倦怠, 厌倦, 无聊, 怠倦

sentences.sentence: "To overcome ennui," Orbuch said, "both parties should focus on adding spice to the relationship, which can be as simple as a new restaurant or vacation spot."
sentences.translation: “为了克服厌倦，”欧布斯说，“双方都应该把精力放在为关系增添情趣上，可以是简单的一家新餐馆或一个度假胜地。”

sentences.sentence: Some are less so – boredom, ennui, dissatisfaction.
sentences.translation: 有些是比这好些——无聊，厌倦，不满。

sentences.sentence: Why, then, move off your couch and risk the ennui of the real world?
sentences.translation: 但是为什么你会离开你的床去冒险经历现实世界的无聊呢？
